full_hostname.ui:help: Find this in your Tailscale admin console under 'DNS' settings. Format: <machine-name>.<tailnet-id>.ts.net
full_hostname.ui:title: Tailscale MagicDNS Hostname

hostname.ui:help: The machine name portion (auto-extracted from full_hostname)
hostname.ui:title: Machine Hostname

tailnet.ui:help: The tailnet domain portion (auto-extracted from full_hostname)
tailnet.ui:title: Tailnet Domain

webui_name.ui:help: The name displayed in the interface header (e.g., 'Leger AI', 'My Company AI')
webui_name.ui:title: WebUI Instance Name

rag_embedding_model.ui:help: Model ID for RAG embeddings. Must be an embedding model from model-store.
rag_embedding_model.ui:title: RAG Embedding Model

ollama_embedding_model.ui:help: Model ID for Ollama embeddings (if using native Ollama daemon).
ollama_embedding_model.ui:title: Ollama Embedding Model

audio_tts_voice.ui:help: OpenAI TTS voice (alloy, echo, fable, onyx, nova, shimmer)
audio_tts_voice.ui:title: TTS Voice

task_model_title.ui:help: Model ID for generating chat titles (ultra-fast, <1B params). Must exist in model-store.
task_model_title.ui:title: Task Model: Title Generation

task_model_tags.ui:help: Model ID for generating conversation tags (balanced, 3-4B params). Must exist in model-store.
task_model_tags.ui:title: Task Model: Tags Generation

task_model_autocomplete.ui:help: Model ID for autocomplete suggestions (ultra-fast, <1B params). Must exist in model-store.
task_model_autocomplete.ui:title: Task Model: Autocomplete Generation

task_model_query.ui:help: Model ID for RAG query rewriting (balanced, 3-4B params). Must exist in model-store.
task_model_query.ui:title: Task Model: Query Generation

task_model_search_query.ui:help: Model ID for web search query generation. Must exist in model-store.
task_model_search_query.ui:title: Task Model: Search Query Generation

task_model_rag_template.ui:help: Model ID for RAG template generation. Must exist in model-store.
task_model_rag_template.ui:title: Task Model: RAG Template Generation

openai_api_key.ui:help: OpenAI API key for GPT models, embeddings, and speech services. Register at https://platform.openai.com/api-keys
openai_api_key.ui:title: OpenAI API Key

anthropic_api_key.ui:help: Anthropic API key for Claude models. Register at https://console.anthropic.com/
anthropic_api_key.ui:title: Anthropic API Key

gemini_api_key.ui:help: Google Gemini API key for Gemini models. Register at https://makersuite.google.com/app/apikey
gemini_api_key.ui:title: Google Gemini API Key

groq_api_key.ui:help: Groq API key for fast inference. Register at https://console.groq.com/
groq_api_key.ui:title: Groq API Key

mistral_api_key.ui:help: Mistral API key for Mistral models. Register at https://console.mistral.ai/
mistral_api_key.ui:title: Mistral API Key

openrouter_api_key.ui:help: OpenRouter API key for unified model access. Register at https://openrouter.ai/keys
openrouter_api_key.ui:title: OpenRouter API Key

perplexity_api_key.ui:help: Perplexity API key for Perplexity models and search. Register at https://www.perplexity.ai/settings/api
perplexity_api_key.ui:title: Perplexity API Key

tavily_api_key.ui:help: Tavily API key for AI-powered web search. Register at https://tavily.com/
tavily_api_key.ui:title: Tavily Search API Key

hf_token.ui:help: HuggingFace token for model downloads. Register at https://huggingface.co/settings/tokens
hf_token.ui:title: HuggingFace API Token

civitai_token.ui:help: CivitAI token for model downloads. Register at https://civitai.com/user/account
civitai_token.ui:title: CivitAI API Token
